website_summaries.verdict: This clean lighting setup is easy to install and even easier to control.
pros: This unit is easy to adjust via smartphone app or mountable controller, which is low-profile and fashionable
A built-in microphone will sync the lights to the beat of your music, and the number of colors is near infinite as you can create your own
Powered by your vehicle’s 12-volt cigarette lighter outlet
cons: The adhesive is underwhelming and you may need to use superglue to properly secure the lights

customer_reviews.title: Worth it
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been using it for around 2 months and am really enjoying it. The lights were pretty easy to install and the built-in control is very convenient. They look fantastic! However, my [small] caveats are: 1. The app is a bit slow in starting up and connecting. I usually just use the built-in controls for this reason. 2. Sometimes the colors don’t actually flash with the music. Once in a while I can get it in sync, but oftentimes it’s flashing on its own mysterious beat. Vid attached is from one of those few times it worked properly. ;) Overall, purchase was worth it. Edit: 10 months in, they’re still working great!
customer_reviews.author: Tatiana

customer_reviews.title: Best interior light system money can buy!
customer_reviews.text: BY FAR...One of the best lighting systems i purchased for my car. I've owned other ones in the past but this one surpasses those greatly! Pros: - Music changes to the beat of the music with is great for a music lover like me. - Able to be controlled via remote or on your phone which is SUPER convenient - Gets people's attention if you have your windows up or down because of how bright they are at night!! Only Con I have: - Colors don't fade into others, its a static switch which is okay but i would love that feature That's my two cents on this product and i would DEFINITELY recommend this to your friends and family!!
customer_reviews.author: Zach Darmer

customer_reviews.title: the lights don't stick
customer_reviews.text: The description claims the adhesive is 3M. only the adhesive on the remote is 3M. None of the adhesives on the lights sticks to the car. One of them even peeled off of the lights when I was peeling off the cover on the back of the adhesive. Even when I can get them to stick, they just fall off when I close the car door. I'd like a full refund or am reporting this seller profile to Amazon for fraud.
customer_reviews.author: Justin K.

customer_reviews.title: Simple & Awesome! UPDATE: Smoking Adapter
customer_reviews.text: Couldn’t ask for more; great price, super easy to set up, and has great performance both in features and brightness. Update as of 3/9/19: I have purchased a total of 3 of these kits. The original one is working well, and one is still in the box. The third one was installed today: half of the lights are dim and only show some colors, but worse, the cigarette lighter adapter started to smoke, filling up the car immediately. I’d keep my eye on these, and possibly go with another brand in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Sonoma County Man

customer_reviews.title: The one color I wanted wasn't there. *REVISED*
customer_reviews.text: First of all, I chopped off the 12v plug and button and hard wired this kit. After that it was easy to run to all 4 seats and hide the wires. However the one color I wanted, Orange, isn't really orange. Its more like a weird yellow. Other than that, the other colors look good. EDIT: So, I didn't realize that in the app I could change the color to practically anythign I wanted. Using the app I was able to find that deep orange color that I wanted that wasn't available from the remote. I have revised my review and rating.
customer_reviews.author: Mark J. Biggs

customer_reviews.title: decent for the price point.
customer_reviews.text: easy to install, but make sure you purchase mounting tape. the tape they give you is absolutely garbage and will not hold at all. this fit in my jeep wrangler wirh no issues. i do not see this being a product that lasts a long time, but for the price point, i guess its worth the money. i gave it a 3 star review due to the horrible tape that's included to mount these lights, and the fear of durability. the app does work well and pairs very easily.
customer_reviews.author: ems_14

customer_reviews.title: Low quality car lighter end
customer_reviews.text: They are great but after I spent the time installing them, the car ligher end of it broke. Otherwise the lights would have been great! Update: Seller send me a new set of lights and it's working great now. Note: I used zip ties to attached the lights, the tape it's not that great. To hide cabling, I customize the wiring.
customer_reviews.author: Priscilla G.

customer_reviews.title: Great product and looks professionally installed for under $20 dollars.
customer_reviews.text: These LED lights are awesome. I always wanted to get these installed in my car, but after getting a quote of $300 dollars, I was set to install it myself. I choose to hardwire them inside my car to make it look professionally done by using a cigarette 12 volt to battery converter which works perfectly by tapping into the fuse box. The LEDs go with the rythm of the music and is very customizable through the app. Although changes don't save through the app (resets when it loses power) which is odd but they do save with the controller unit.
customer_reviews.author: Dylan R.

customer_reviews.title: Expectation was higher than what I received
customer_reviews.text: Lights are nice: I have an extremely difficult time keeping them stuck to the area I’ve placed them. I’m constantly having to redo taping and placement. Length is ok. I may order a different brand to compare and I’ll provide an updated review once that’s done. I’m not sure if the lights are the best quality for the price, hence wanting to order a set elsewhere.
customer_reviews.author: suzi

customer_reviews.title: Lights are great, the plug needs some work. Over all happy with product.
customer_reviews.text: Would be 5 stars if it has not been for the faulty plug. I ended up clipping the wire and hardwiring the lights in bc if you barely moved the plug it would disconnect. Now that they are hardwired in the lights look really good. I do like the Bluetooth controls with the app it makes it easier to work with. Initially the lights are not bright until you download the application and turn the brightness all the way up.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon Topper

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I love the lights, they look really cool and installation was super easy! But then... they suck, the double sided adhesive DOES NOT work, literally 5 minutes after installation they were already falling off, I had suspected this would be an issue but based off the reviews it didnt seem like anyone else was having that issue. Probably gonna just take them right back out, do not even waste your time!
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: Party bus
customer_reviews.text: There is no better lights than these. I can’t stress this enough. The app is better than others and it works like a charm. This is my third set and I’ve felt a lot more comfortable with these than previous brands. The music function is great with these and if feels like the mic will adjust the sensitivity to how loud your music is playing which is great hiding the wires is a bit more difficult because they are all connected on a big loop rather than 4 separate lines but it’s 100% worth it. Hopefully they last long but great product
customer_reviews.author: Jill

customer_reviews.title: That cheapo full brightness rainbow disco start up sequence is enough to make me want to return it
customer_reviews.text: I may be a bit more critical than most because I expect something that isn’t ghetto-fied. My major gripes: #1: the start up sequence every time is a disco rainbow flash at full brightness. Extremely tacky and a total giveaway that it is a cheapo stick on LED kit. #2: dimmest brightness is still beyond any OEM brightness and again is a distraction and a dead giveaway. #3: should give us an option to tap into a separate power source to automatically dim lights and a specific power source for full brightness, E.G. when the door opens.
customer_reviews.author: Robert W.

customer_reviews.title: Unbeatable value and a must have LED accent lightning system for every vehicle.
customer_reviews.text: You know, most premium class vehicles have their own LED accent lighting packages, but this kit does way more than them. The phone app works perfect and the built-in mic is really sensitive if you want the lights to "dance" with the rhythm. I like the one body design as it does not require any extra connections. I did install it within 20 minutes and all the cable management was concealed and clean. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Maximus

customer_reviews.title: Great led light set
customer_reviews.text: Wow...what a great led accent light set for the price. Works like it should. Very bright. Works well with music. Only problem was figuring out how to run the lights without cutting the wires. The adhesive is nice and strong. Haven't tried it with the app yet, but I will update soon.
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth M.

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for...
customer_reviews.text: Received the lights and from the opening the led strips had come out of the plastic tubing. Placed back inside gently and place the cap back on. Only 3 colors work, no blue, no pink....if you choose a color besides green, red or orange you may get one light to work. The double sided tape that’s included is cheap and won’t stick. I have to replace with 3M tape. Also, the app doesn’t stay connected when you leave the screen. It has to reconnect every time. Wasted an hour installing these lights to find out I now have to replace them. Will not buy these again.
customer_reviews.author: Vince

customer_reviews.title: Not what I expected
customer_reviews.text: Not to thrilled I'm not happy about how these are wired and set up with the remote wired to lites and that you have to use a cigarette lighter port for power just seems like it's going to be a hassel to install in fact I'm thinking about just selling them and ordering something else.Dont get me wrong Minger is a very good company I've bought a few of there home led lites and they have great customer service.its just this set is not what I expected.
customer_reviews.author: Mitchell

customer_reviews.title: Cool Lights!
customer_reviews.text: These lights are cool. Every time I turn them on it just gives my vehicle an interesting atmosphere. My brothers got in my car and when I flipped the lights on and cranked the music up it turned into a party drive, lol. My only complaint is that the adhesion could be better. The lights that extend to my backseats just didn't stay adhered to the seats so I had to come up with my own way of keeping them from constantly detaching.
customer_reviews.author: JJ

customer_reviews.title: 2 issues but manageable
customer_reviews.text: Great product. lights work great at night. wiring isn't that big of an issue. just hide n tuck. 2 problems i ran into. first problem..the adhesive on the light strips don't stick very well. clean the surface first with rubbing alcohol. this will help when placing the light strip. second problem...these light strips are strung together. and not truck friendly. more for car use. I had an issue with passenger side and rear seat passenger side. wasn't long enough to place from rear seat passenger side, up to front passenger side. but i managed to make it work. other than that. these light strips work great. and at night, they're bright. and flow with whatever music I'm listening to.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Bright LED’s with easy installation!
customer_reviews.text: This product is amazing! I was looking for some floor lighting for my vehicle and came across these lights. I was able to install them by hard wiring them to my vehicle. You can also plug it in using the cigarette lighter. First off, these things are bright! They def give you the lighting you need to illuminate the floor. You can always adjust brightness and color with the control or app. It comes with a 3M adhesive tape that will stick fairly well. The light cables are long that you’re able to install them around your car easily. If you’re looking for some great lighting for your car this is it!
customer_reviews.author: Danny

customer_reviews.title: Fun while it lasted
customer_reviews.text: I waited on this review wanting to see how long they would last I got about 5 months out of mine although the company reached out to me when I purchased at the time I had no problems but now it’s in the trash lights stopped working it was cool for a little while
customer_reviews.author: Damionus

customer_reviews.title: Light show every day lol love them
customer_reviews.text: Easy install! Got these for my husband’s 2020 Toyota Tacoma he absolutely loves it. We found out that it has a microphone so you do not actually have to download the app to control the lights unless you want to. Just install plug-in and go turn the music on and the lights were dance to the music automatically. Pretty cool light show driving down the road LOL. Does not interfere with your vision or driving the lights are not that great but they’re good enough for what it’s supposed to be used for
customer_reviews.author: Jeannie

customer_reviews.title: Works...
customer_reviews.text: It is bright, however mine seem to flicker/flash quite a bit in-between colors. Kind of like a lightbulb that’s dying. I thought that the transition between colors would be more smooth and wholesome, but it a bit off-putting. It’s also a bit offbeat when responding to my music. It comes with zipties to help manage the cord, and it has glue adhesions on the back of the lights that aren’t the greatest.
customer_reviews.author: Kong Cheng Moua

customer_reviews.title: Definite bang for the buck!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome price! Don’t hesitate to purchase! This kit has multiple uses and has many options! Fun to play with and can be used also for a dome light if you just want light. This is also very durable and plenty of cable. I used the adhesive and still sticking even when used off road on my RZR,
customer_reviews.author: David R

customer_reviews.title: broken pieces
customer_reviews.text: I put them on my motorcycle got them all wired up and zip tied and hid the wire when I got done installing i put power to the lights they all worked but one piece now I have to take them back off and return them thats a little inconvenient so depending on how you make this right is how I right the review thanks in advance have a great day!
customer_reviews.author: Pamela cabiness

customer_reviews.title: I dont want to super glue them to my car ...
customer_reviews.text: Takes about 5 ten minutes to install. I was able to hide all the wires so it looks professional. Only thing is careful adjusting your seats back and forth might accidentally pull the whole thing off or worse snap the wire. They're cool definitely however also need need adhesive 10/10 would buy for the rest of my cars if they actually stayed in place!
customer_reviews.author: Sam

customer_reviews.title: I loved it!!!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love them. I just placed them in my car today. It was easy application! The only thing that I noticed is the adhesive on the lights was not the strongest so I used gorilla tape on the wires around them to reinforce it. But I mean for the price I paid, I’m not complaining! I downloaded the app and connected it to my Bluetooth on my phone and was excited to see that I can play around with the colors and even set it up to the beat of my music playing. Would definitely get it again!
customer_reviews.author: Valerie Jackson

customer_reviews.title: Works. Compact. Minimilastic.
customer_reviews.text: Product works. Not very accurate pulsation/strobing with music but good enough for government work. I would have given 5 stars if the cable was longer for back seats. Installed it on 2019 VW Jetta 4dr Sedan. I had to tuck the back cable underneath center console cover in order to reach the front seats metal guide rails where I attached the led strips to, for back floor lighting. Also the cable to remote control and power plug could have been a bit longer. I dont believe this product is good for bigger sedans/SUVs or trucks. Will update to see how long it will last. So far everything is sticking on. Goodluck shopping!
customer_reviews.author: Master Shiner

customer_reviews.title: I'd buy another one
customer_reviews.text: This product was awesome. I tried this simply because I drop stuff while night driving and i have. a hard time finding it. This has helped me alot, and not just from it's pretty lights, but to it's intended purpose to see. Also connects to music and "blinks" with the songs. I would recommend. Quality is great especially since I had to funnel the wires through tight areas.
customer_reviews.author: Travis

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Great product! Bought on prime day for 14$ I just got it installed and it’s awesome All my friends got this professionally done to their car for like hundreds of dollars but i did it myself for 15$. I just tucked the wiring into the center console of my civic, wiring could be a little shorter but hey, there’s enough wiring to even go to the back seats if you wanted. I haven’t figured out the Bluetooth yet, i actually forgot it came with it
customer_reviews.author: Dustin

customer_reviews.title: Great at first but...
customer_reviews.text: I had these for about 6 months, they really were awesome. They went well with the music and the colors looked fantastic. The adhesive gave away pretty quick, but I just put more on and they haven’t come off since. However, recently it stopped displaying almost every color but red and a weird off white. I can’t switch colors anymore, it’s pretty much stuck on red. The app works great. The lights were great when they worked, so I would recommend them, but be weary. They have a very limited usage time.
customer_reviews.author: Adam Grifith

customer_reviews.title: Almost perfect
customer_reviews.text: Lights work great and the control through the app is awesome. My biggest problem is that the cord is too short for proper installation. The lights couldn’t be installed under the foot (pedal) area in my 2017 Nissan Rogue Sport . Instead, the lights had to go under the front seats , both for the front row lights and back row lights. Would have been a 5 star review if the cord had been longer.
customer_reviews.author: Adrian Castillo

customer_reviews.title: Simple installation great performance!
customer_reviews.text: I have had this in my car for a while and I can fully say that I'm impressed. It was extremely simple to install and has been performing flawlessly. When I first set it all up, I turned on my car and nothing happened, I tried the remote and it still didn't do anything. I then realized that you have to click the red button on the cigarette plug to turn it on and it worked! Setting up the app on my iphone only took around 5 minutes. I think my favorite part is when it changes colors based on the music that currently playing.
customer_reviews.author: Jbdawinnapws

customer_reviews.title: Not what I expected
customer_reviews.text: Really would’ve been helpful to know that this is one long continuous cord and not 4 separate cords. I made it work with some playing around. Also it is extremely cheaply put together. The features work fine and different modes. I can’t speak on adhesion just yet but they seem okay. It did however drain my car battery so idk if I’ll use them
customer_reviews.author: Aman

customer_reviews.title: Overall good
customer_reviews.text: I'm only leaving three stars because of the annoying high pitched squealing / whining noise that comes out of the lights themselves. The lights are good quality, stick to my car just fine, and look very appealing at night. If there's a way to get rid of the noise, please get back to me. EDIT: someone from the company contacted me promptly and gave me a solution. If you download the app and update it fully, it will correct the noise. Wonderful set of lights.
customer_reviews.author: Wyatt K.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome lights for your auto
customer_reviews.text: Works great and looks awesome in the truck. Just have extra 3M double sided tape on hand, but I ended up also using the little test ties that came in the packaging. I don't know how I never had these before. Minger/ ihoment LED lights are and brighter than all competition out there. I have ordered other Minger products and I am not disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Rob Willse

customer_reviews.title: Cheap cheap product. Wires aren't long enough
customer_reviews.text: These are horrible. I have a dodge dually and wanted to add some foot light. The wires aren't nearly long enough to stretch thru my cab. The adhesive was already coming off when I recieved them and to top it all off, the plastic sleeve that protects the actual LED bulbs slid right over. I bet it cost them less than 5 bucks to make these because I wouldn't spend 5 bucks on them. Avoid these and get something better.
customer_reviews.author: Scotty❤

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: The set was easy, the hard part is when under your seat is fabric so it won’t stick like it said it would. So I improvised with more tucking and zip-locking that it came with. The WiFi keep making things complicated because when you’re not connected it won’t come up. Overall, it was everything I imagined and I can finally see in my car at night time with style. I’m satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Tee

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install easier to operate
customer_reviews.text: I expected a cheap halfway working set of lights and for there to be a lot of wire splicing and what not but It took me 10-15 min from the time I had them out of the box to be completely installed. There was no wire splicing the switch and remote are easy to use and install and the quality and intensity of of all the colors these lights change to is amazing! My 5 year old was flipping through all the modes and changing the settings to his liking in the first hour I had them!
customer_reviews.author: Zach

customer_reviews.title: Lights work, but don't stick to cloth
customer_reviews.text: The lights work great, and probably would stick to plastic or metal fine, but the cord didn't reach far enough to the back seats to stick to the plastic part, so I had to try sticking them to the cloth under the back of the front seats. They fell off of the cloth. I could probably staple them on or sew them on though. Also the cords are rather cumbersome which creates a problem if trying to stick them anywhere but right under your feet. This product would benefit from wireless blue tooth technology, and each strip having it's own batter source, but that would of course make it too expensive.
customer_reviews.author: L. Adams

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Really nice lights, they gave me enough wire to reach all the areas and the app works just fine. If your vehicle has a wax type finish on the plastic trip panels and the adhesive isn't sticking. Spray some break cleaner on a rag, wipe the area down, wait for it to dry, and put on the adhesive.
customer_reviews.author: Josh

customer_reviews.title: Good At First - Not Anymore
customer_reviews.text: At first these were great. I had someone who works on cars put them in so they were done properly. It’s been a month and now none are stuck anymore. They all ate dangling or fallen off completely. And my return window is now closed so I’m stuck with lights that are pointless. They also don’t actually switch to music exactly they’re slightly off. I guess you get what you pay for but I will not be purchasing again. I’m pretty upset I wasted my money on this and can’t return. Keep this in mind while purchasing.
customer_reviews.author: Kailyn Miller

customer_reviews.title: I recommend reinforcing with 3m heavy duty mounting tape
customer_reviews.text: These are so dope for the price. Installs clean if you are patient. I recommend reinforcing with 3m heavy duty mounting tape. It holds anything on and if you clean the area you're mounting on with alcohol before you install it won't go anywhere! Have fun
customer_reviews.author: Jesse Miranda

customer_reviews.title: Like it so far :)
customer_reviews.text: Great product, I sincerely like it alot. I was worried about how long the single strip would be, however, I thankfully have a small car. If you have a small kia soul, then this would fit great! I was grateful for the zip ties in the box, I zip tied the first three led strip. And the second one I used the adhesive strip on the back of the LED strip. Its day two, and so far they're working with my super loud heavy rock music. I blasted BlackPink's recent album, and let me just say this. KILL THIS LOVE was so epic with these lights!
customer_reviews.author: angel

customer_reviews.title: Love these
customer_reviews.text: My husband put this in the car the same day he got it. He loves this and I do too!! The adhesives could have been a bit more attachable and It could have came with directions. We had to go on YouTube to see if we installed it properly. But over all . They look really nice and at night, it is definitely a party starter!
customer_reviews.author: Katherine Almonte

customer_reviews.title: Great concept, terrible cohesion
customer_reviews.text: Overall, I enjoyed the product for the amount of time I used it for (a few weeks). I was only experimenting with my car and am happy to have given it a go. Lights worked without problem, I did run into some user errors because I didn't conceal the wires completely and some got pulled out when passengers entered the vehicle. If I would've taken the time, it can be pretty easily concealed. I'm definitely not a car person, but was able to figure it out without issue. The only complaint I have is the adhesion that comes with the product. It refused to stick. Like others, I had to buy some external tape which seemed to do the trick.
customer_reviews.author: Jadon Steinmetz

customer_reviews.title: Best Amazon Purchase To Date
customer_reviews.text: I love these lights! They make those night time car rides ten times better and I get sooo many compliments on them. I installed them myself, it only took about 10 mins once I figured out the best cord placement for me. I did not use the zip ties and I have not had any of my lights fall and I've had them for almost three months now. The app is easy to use however I don't use it much. I only liked it for the custom color feature but the lights reset every time I get in my car, so I actually don't have much use for the app at this point.
customer_reviews.author: Ms. Bridges

customer_reviews.title: Worthless adhesive
customer_reviews.text: It's super simplified, and you're going to have wires showing no matter what you do, but the worst part is the adhesive on these will last 15 minutes tops. Might as well spend the extra and get something that will actually stick to a cleaned spot in your car. There is 3M tape on the remote fob, but not the lights, which makes no sense at all. Now I'm off to spend money on better tape to rig it up. Sure, the lights work, but what's the point if they are laying on the floor?
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer L. Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Cool desighn concept, not sure it's gonna work for me tho.
customer_reviews.text: Worked, technically. Seemed simple and quality with straight-thru cord design, but installation was a little difficult, having to loop back at times. Mic worked for converting sound to light, but was too sensitive, picking up the AC and road noise. Also the sticker clips must require a super smooth surface to hold at all. I couldn't get any to stick. And tho the light adhesive seemed strong, I found one sitting on the floor after a day in the sun. Hmm. Love the concept in theory tho.
customer_reviews.author: Kristopher Westover

customer_reviews.title: WARNING! DO NOT BUY THIS ITEM, RECEIVED JAN 4 AND STOPPED WORKING FEBRUARY 7 - WORST AMAZON PURCHASE
customer_reviews.text: Since I received it january 4 2019 i turned it on in my car about 4 or 5 times for about 10 minutes each time until February 7 2019 when it stopped turning on at all. So I got about 40 or 50 minutes of use out of it and I am now conveniently a few days out of the return window. This is junk, quality and not an item made to last. Do yourself a favor and go with a better quality light strip. I am super dissapointed! This was the worst purchase I have ever made on amazon.
customer_reviews.author: mariluz rojas

customer_reviews.title: Good customer service
customer_reviews.text: Update: the company contacted me and sent me a new product promptly. Very good customer service They look and work great (when they stick). The adhesive on the back is garbage and does not stick to the car surface. I used super lue after the driver side light kept falling down onto my feet. The light are cool though
customer_reviews.author: Michael Jamison

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic lights, however...
customer_reviews.text: Great lights. Super bright. Had them for a little over a month. My only complaint is they have started to lose their grip. Occasionally i have to push them back down. They are installed in my car. I believe the temperature changes in the car must be the reason for this issue. Not surprised. All lighting such as this will do this. Unfortunate because these lights are excellent.
customer_reviews.author: Murdatyme Psn

customer_reviews.title: Nice bright lights
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to install. Took me maybe 15 mins to install in my Nissan Altima. Pro tip: Place first light on passenger side and work clockwise. I ran the cord under the floor mat and then second and third light on center console in the back. Then in between to the driver side along the side of center console.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worth it!
customer_reviews.text: It was so easy to install, the wires are easy to hide because the package comes with a bunch of zip ties. The adhesive could be better but it can be easily reinforced. The colors look great and the app is really simple to use. Totally worth it! The set fit my Jeep perfectly, I started on the driver's side.
customer_reviews.author: M. Fairfield

customer_reviews.title: One of a kind!
customer_reviews.text: This product is perfect! I was looking for red LED lights that flash to the music. Most lights either do a single color constant, or multi-color sync with music. This can sync with one color, multi-color, fade, flash, or many other different features. This is the only product that would sync to music with a single color. There is also an app that can control the lights. I don't need to use it but it's a great feature!
customer_reviews.author: J. P.

customer_reviews.title: Car light, little issue with app
customer_reviews.text: I got this as a gift for Christmas. I personally did not install the light by my sister could not get the app to work. That being said she absolutely loves the look of it and controls the lights with the attached remote. It responds great with the music in the car and it looks like it was done by a professional.
customer_reviews.author: Ingri Cabezas

customer_reviews.title: Satisfied
customer_reviews.text: Tape strip is mediocre. To close to the heat while it's on the fresher side, and it may just drop. Wiring is a solid complete line. Caps for the ends of the tubing, aren't sealed. The light strip will pull out of the tube. In which case with mine, a solder point broke. Thankfully I know how to fix that. If you know how to splice wires, it's simple to shorten and customize. The microphone, in the controller works well enough, when it comes to the dancing lights. All things said....
customer_reviews.author: nateandrews6

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Budget LEDs
customer_reviews.text: Lights look awesome. Needs more length of wire to the last 2 sets of LEDs. Couldn't reach the back floorboard with the provided length. Cigarette lighter power is cheap and trashy, so I hardwired them into the fuse box with a expandable circuit and a 15 amp fuse. Lights up with ignition. Use some really good 3m automotive adhesive and clean your surface with isopropyl alcohol before adhering lights. Also ziptie all excess wires so it's a clean install. Then enjoy!
customer_reviews.author: keith nelson

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price
customer_reviews.text: This thing is cool, great for the price- I'm a part time uber driver and it is a really nice feature. The adhesive tape didn't work for me but for 6 bucks I got a roll of gorilla double sided tape and i was good to go. Just a heads up, for two dollars more you can get the updated version of this which has a few upgrades.
customer_reviews.author: charles gliver

customer_reviews.title: I love these lights
customer_reviews.text: These lights were easy to install, and they light up my entire car. You can adjust the brightness and the color wheel is endless. The only annoying part is that I can hear this small high pitched noise when I turn them on due to me having a bluetooth adapter for me to listen to music in my car. Maybe the frequencies are interfering each other not sure but heads up for people who have the blue tooth adapter and want these lights. Also when it is way too hot ouside the adhesive wants to peal off the lights. But Im pretty sure thats explanatory due to it being hot.
customer_reviews.author: Maya Saunders

customer_reviews.title: Brings so much life to the car atmosphere!
customer_reviews.text: The wiring diagram shown in the item photos was different from the real product. i.e. the item photos show the center box branching out to two wires with two LEDs on each side. however the wiring on the real kit has the led strips in series all in one wire. installation was pretty simple to be honest, just a matter of hiding the wires and making sure the LEDs can stick or be tied under the seats. The brightness is 7/10, with it barely visible in the day, and very visible in the evening. I do note that some colors are brighter than the others, blue is the brightest in my use.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Kao

customer_reviews.title: Works great when it actually sticks
customer_reviews.text: Ok product so far. The music sync works well and the app is an interesting way to control it. The adhesive tape seems really bad on one of my lights and keeps falling off unfortunately. Other than that a great buy, just make sure to get some better adhesive with it. Would be 5 stars except for the bad adhesive. Updated review: Seller was really fast to get in touch and help rectify the problem, sent a new unit which hopefully sticks better than the original but 5 stars for the great customer service.
customer_reviews.author: Fabian Castellon

customer_reviews.title: Perfect gift for a car guy
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my roommate's new BMW 428i and he loved it. No instructions come inside the box but the amazon listing does show a guideline of how to normally run the cables, ended up switching the layout with ease and luckily didn't have to take things apart to hide the wires. Lights work very well and I was actually surprised with how good the music syncing feature was (compared to other items i've used in the past with the same feature, this one works the best). After about a month of use, one of the lights did start losing their 3M stickiness but that was a very easy fix & everything else is still going good!
customer_reviews.author: Kendall Mills

customer_reviews.title: The indoor of my car looks like a million bucks!
customer_reviews.text: You cannot beat the price! I installed the lights in my 2016 Scion. The length of the lights strip was perfect to make the installation look clean. Here's some advice for those who live in the cold climate: Use gorilla glue while installing the double-sided sticker to help the tape real stay in place. After using my car heater daily I realized that the strips were falling down but a few drops of gorilla glue worked perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Yesenia

customer_reviews.title: Interior music lights are an A+
customer_reviews.text: I really wasn’t sure about these lights and didn’t expect much. But they proved me wrong! Super cheap for the good quality light strips. Shipping was quick. Easy to install. I installed them on my 2019 mustang GT. I get a lot of compliments and they are a HUGE hit at car shows. Would definitely recommend this product 👏👏
customer_reviews.author: THIS ACCOUNT IS STOLEN!!

customer_reviews.title: Very good light great value.
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely amazing lights, took a bit to run them where no wires were seen but once I got them right they are beautiful. have the luxury vehicle feel! The sync to music feature is amazing and works well check out my video. We love these in our Cadillac
customer_reviews.author: H. Harper

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: First time buy but it’s absolutely flawlessly great they work amazing and I can’t be happier the only bummer is wishing cable would be longer but other than that 10 stars I did not expect the Bluetooth lol
customer_reviews.author: WesBear

customer_reviews.title: Fun product!
customer_reviews.text: Works well for the price. Was very easy to install and hide the wires. Depending on the model of you’re car, you might not be able to find a place to stick with the adhesive strips, but the zip ties will work instead.. I used Velcro where the adhesive is in the front and zip ties in the back.
customer_reviews.author: Rod Kindlund

customer_reviews.title: They’re okay..
customer_reviews.text: The lights don’t really go with the beat of the music, and you get what you pay for. I had the lights for a week and they didn’t stick even straight out of the package. I had to buy Velcro for attachment. The colors are very vibrant, they just come apart very easily.
customer_reviews.author: Virginia ellen

customer_reviews.title: Nice but Cheap quality
customer_reviews.text: I haven’t had this item very long but the wires are coming loose and the sticky pads to hang up the lights doesn’t stick very long. The colors are bright and it is good concept if only it would last longer. It is about as cheap as a pair of knock off AirPods.
customer_reviews.author: Drsa7581

customer_reviews.title: Bluetooth won’t connect.
customer_reviews.text: UPDATE: Bluetooth connects now! Not sure if there was an update on the app or what but. So glad I didn’t return them. **** Will not connect to Bluetooth. The low review is because it’s the main reason I purchased the lights. I’ve tried everything. Will be returning and buying from a different supplier.
customer_reviews.author: Kris

customer_reviews.title: nice for some usual lighting
customer_reviews.text: I bought two sets of these. I installed one in my truck which was a bit of work and another set on my elderly mothers mobility scooter to pimp it out. She is the envy of everyone now. They work great and respond nicely to music and the app makes it work well together
customer_reviews.author: Karl Beyer

customer_reviews.title: Nice colors and very fun for night drives!!
customer_reviews.text: Here's the view from the front seats! It is very nice and colorful, I love how the mic can pickup from the music. Very easy to install and the lights behind the seats for the back lights up very nicely, not too bright just the right amount at night!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The product is ok
customer_reviews.text: The adhesive that’s suppose to make the led light stick...doesn’t work so well. One of my lights won’t stick. So if you buy this product get you some glue . The cord is too short....but I made it work. The app is super cool and the lights can go with your music and I love that about it. I may buy another brand !
customer_reviews.author: Kandy

customer_reviews.title: Easy peasy
customer_reviews.text: So, I just finished installing these in my truck only took maybe 30 minutes. Most of that to just figure out where I was going to mount everything but so far it's a great product I've tested the brightness settings, color to music, and the app. All of it works like it should although the real test comes in the dark. If these LEDs can light up my truck then you can keep the 5 stars!
customer_reviews.author: Chris Lumpkin

customer_reviews.title: It's good but could be better
customer_reviews.text: I really wish I could give this product five stars. However, the brightness could be a little better. The vibration also to the music is just very generic. But honestly if you're looking for something simple for your car I would definitely get this
customer_reviews.author: mtruexjr

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Used super glue to set it in (I have carpet in my car) and they work great, the app works well with it, i never have an issue connecting it. I can change the phases and colors, and can just use one color if I feel like not being too flashy
customer_reviews.author: Pakalolotrash

customer_reviews.title: Awesome customer service! Fun lights.
customer_reviews.text: I recommend these lights for your car. We got them for our teenagers in our car. Easy to turn on or off. Can bop with beat of music if you want. We had a problem and had to contact customer service and they were awesome. Got right back to us and took care of the problem right away. Definitely recommend Govee.
customer_reviews.author: Sir Graves

customer_reviews.title: Buy it and try it for yourself everyone is different.
customer_reviews.text: It was really cool and pretty. But the wires are everywhere and bulky and a mess. The sticky stuff to hold it up stopped working after like one ride.l Can’t move my seats once installed. No directions to help. But a fun addition to the car while driving and listening to music at night.
customer_reviews.author: Anna

customer_reviews.title: Good except for syncing with music and adhesive
customer_reviews.text: Lights look great, cords are long enough, except the cord from the plug to the remote is pretty short. Adhesive isn't very strong, tried two different kinds of tape, still looking around for more to keep lights stuck. The lights don't sync very well with music unless the music is really loud, lights still jump around between colors even when music is paused. ALSO, I have a Bluetooth FM Transmitter for my music and when I use that with the lights, there is a ringing sound, but only on the colors purple, orange, and white. So I guess I will just have to use my aux cord. But all these problems can be fixed and still have good lights.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick

customer_reviews.title: This cheap led light strip is awesome!
customer_reviews.text: These led lights far exceeded my expectations. I was just wanting some cheap lights for my Jeep grill, I had no idea just how customizable these are with the app and beat to the music so precisely. I will order again next time I need rgb lights. The adhesive is even sticky unlike other brands.
customer_reviews.author: M. Hunt

customer_reviews.title: LOVE THESE
customer_reviews.text: I stuck these under my dash in my Subaru wrx and they make the inside so awesome looking. I get so many compliments. I love them. I recommend them!
customer_reviews.author: Lauren plate

customer_reviews.title: Awesome lights. Don't waste your money on any other lights
customer_reviews.text: Ok so I would definitely recommend these to anyone that likes awesome interior lights that flash with the music and has class. I have to be honest about the glue. It is strong but don't stick good to all surfaces. I broke 2 strands but 2 still work. I told the company that makes them and they sent me an upgraded set and let me keep the other set. Govee or go home.
customer_reviews.author: Brett

customer_reviews.title: Love this product!
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to set up and it connects to your phone very quickly. The app even lets you create your own color combinations. It has brightness control and even can play to music. I really like this product. Makes my car look really nice.
customer_reviews.author: Kaylena Birmingham

customer_reviews.title: Eh
customer_reviews.text: Adhesive sucks. I’m going to have to buy new adhesive to get it to stick. Pretty much only installation issues. Connecting to the app was easy. But it keeps falling off and the wires keep getting tangled and lost under seats because of that. Not super good value for money
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Would buy again
customer_reviews.text: Great product would buy again. No problems with burning any fuses and I use it with a police radar and phone charger. The app is cool because you can adjust the brightness and pick the exact color on a scale. Easy to install because it comes in one long strip.. however the adhesive wasn’t too sticky and there was nowhere to stick it to for the backseat lights so I had to zip tie it. Still oils great. The wires are all completly hidden and tucked away.
customer_reviews.author: Tyler

customer_reviews.title: Best interior car ambient lights out there.
customer_reviews.text: These are perfect. easy install plug and play into a cigarette lighter don't have to worry about wiring and welding and what not. You're very easy to hide the cords under the trims. With very minimal wires showing underneath the seats. The app works wonderfully with this. You even have a d i y where you can have the lights fade or flicker or even do a custom light. On a color wheel. I'm very satisfied with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Dan J

customer_reviews.title: Great lights but you will need to buy stronger tape
customer_reviews.text: The lights are very radiant and look good at night. The way the lights are all connected makes it slightly more difficult to install but should not take too long. The only problem I have is I live in Florida and it gets hot so the 3m tape that is on the lights has already disconnected from the bottom of my dash and will no longer stay up. It wore out after about a month. I did everything right I never kicked or pulled it, the tape simply was not good.
customer_reviews.author: Tom B.

customer_reviews.title: Dissatisfied
customer_reviews.text: Sorry to leave this negative comment but, already emailed about a simple customization that apparently can't be done. When I got this product I was quite excited to use it but, once I tried to install it I had a problem. That problem being said was that the middle cable cord was too small in length to fit. The other problem was with the customization that couldn't be done which was not being able to make the middle cord longer
customer_reviews.author: Luis

customer_reviews.title: Updated - good for the price
customer_reviews.text: So originally I gave this 1 star bc the lights stopped working shortly after getting them. The customer service was actually outstanding and was a 5 star service! I am only giving this 4 stars though Bc the original size I ordered was bigger and the new free replacements they sent were smaller so they did not easily fit In my car in the front and back because the lights were shorter and the cord length wasn’t longer. The lights were still very bright. I’d buy them again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fun, but quit working in two months.
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my son for Christmas. He LOVES them! An inexpensive and fun gift for a teenage boy. He was able to easily install them. However, they only worked for two months and in that tone were probably turned on only 10-15 times for just a few minutes. (It’s actually my car, so I don’t use them.) Last week the passenger side lights stopped working for no apparent reason. Curious if anyone has had this experience.
customer_reviews.author: Sheila G.

customer_reviews.title: Great value for fun accent!
customer_reviews.text: These lights are very cool, they can change colors, go to the beet of the music, easy stick. I plugged them into my center console & used them under my captains chairs and third row. Had to hide wires under the mat, but for the price it was easy & a great value!
customer_reviews.author: deborah Maass

customer_reviews.title: The lights blew out within a month.
customer_reviews.text: At first the only problem was that they didn’t stick well to my car at all, however as I continued to use them after apply heavy super glue I realized that the plastic covering the lights began to melt away. This left the lights exposed and looking trashy, I let it continue for a few days before trying to adjust them so they could be salvaged. I turned the lights off and Long story short- they never turned on again. Unplugged and plugged back in and nothing. Don’t waste your money or the hour and a half it takes to install them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome even without use of the app!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this light kit! My car looks so fancy at night with the under dash lights on now! There is an app for this with additional modes which I have not used, but I intend to—I really want to see all of the cool features this neat little lit kit has to offer! 100% recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Club inside a fiesta
customer_reviews.text: Not sure what adhesion means but the lights are great. Took maybe 30 minutes to install. Really, really easy to use and put together. Just gives the inside of the vehicle much more life. Great if you’re an Uber or Lyft.
customer_reviews.author: Rolando M.

customer_reviews.title: Best lights for car! EXACTLY what I had wanted :)
customer_reviews.text: I am very happy with this product! For the settings and ability to synch up with my music in different ways. Everyone has complimented these and I've had to send the link to multiple friends who ended up adding the lights to their cars! All around great product, people of all ages love and appreciate them. The app is easy to use, lights are easy to install, and they are fantastic!! I love that you can choose to have the colors shifting with the music or can set to one setting! Great addition to the car- makes long drives fun and drives at night entertaining! :-)
customer_reviews.author: Shreena G.

customer_reviews.title: Not Quite as Sticky as I'd Like
customer_reviews.text: The LED lights are bright and look great in the car. The only issue is the tape on the back isn't sticking to the molding as good as we'd like it to. The controller has 3M sticking tape, and stayed in place. The Lights themselves, do not. So they fall off periodically. However, doesn't take away from the ease of use and how bright they are.
customer_reviews.author: Mel B.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect product, perfect price
customer_reviews.text: I was worried it wouldn't work if I cut off the cig lit part and hardwired the lights to my 2005 toyota corolla. Sure enough it worked perfectly when connected to the bus port, and hasn't stopped working yet. I placed the button discreetly under the steering wheel. And I don't even need the app the buttons work good enough for me.
customer_reviews.author: Flores Family

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as advertised
customer_reviews.text: The product is an easy plug and play type. It'll follow the music pretty well, it's simple to install if you're like me and do not like wires you'll have to get creative to tuck them, yet again it was more of a task for me since I barely have anything to tuck them in my cars cabin. Overall great quality haven't installed completely yet due to upholstery getting re done.
customer_reviews.author: Jesus Pena

customer_reviews.title: Really cool, easy to control with phone
customer_reviews.text: So cool!! I really like it! It first was a little confusing to install, but when I look the video and it make a little sense to me. But I still did it. They looks really cool in inside, the people from outside they can see my LED lights from inside, which is good! I really like Govee Home strip lights I already have one that’s for my room and I got a other one for my car!!!
customer_reviews.author: LeeAnn Bailey

product_meta.title: MINGER Unifilar Car LED Strip Light, 4pcs 48 LED APP Controller Car Interior Lights, Waterproof Multicolor Music Under Dash Lighting Kits for iPhone Android Smart Phone, Car Charger Included, DC 12V
feature_bullets: ➤Upgraded One-Line Design : The lights tape's back come with strong adhesive, a line connect with four strip lights, no need assemble the strip light, more easy to install and hide, keep your car clean and tidy. This cigarette lighter plug has switch and indicator light, built-in fuse, effectively protect the vehicle lights. Suitable for any model cars.

➤Easy to Control : Forget the remote what easy to lose, we provide a more convenient and fashion controller, enjoy to change the color, brightness, music mode. And you can stick the controller on the nearby next you for safety drive. What's more, you can use the APP to control the light.

➤Music Sync : Built-in high sensitivity mic sound sensitive function, the interior car lights will sync any sound captured from microphone, and then the lights will change their colors following the music rhythm, increase safety of driving in daytime and nighttime.
➤Muti-colors : Come with RGB car LED strip,over 16 million colors and different tones for selection, you can create your own unique color to perfect enhancement for upgrading your car.

➤Safe to Use : Car LED light strip has a working voltage of 12V and powered by car charger are equipped with short circuit protection and memory function. IP65 waterproof, extremely low-heat, touchable and safety for children.

specifications.Special Features: APP Control, Waterproof, Memory, Brightness Dimmable, Easy installed, RGB Color Changing, Music Sync
specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.3 out of 5 stars5,868 ratings4.3 out of 5 stars
